Name: City Name
Remarks: A combination of either N401 through N404, or N405 and N406 may be adequate to specify a location.

Name: State or Province Code
Notes: Code (Standard State/Province) as defined by appropriate government agency
Remarks: N402 is required only if city name (N401) is in the U.S. or Canada.

Name: Postal Code
Notes: Code defining international postal zone code excluding punctuation and blanks (zip code for United States)

Name: Location Identifier
Notes: Code which identifies a specific location
Remarks: C0605: If N4-06 is present, then N4-05 is required
